original_text: This is written in the Bible about God's Messiah: ‘Those people that nobody ever told them about him will now see. Those people who have never heard about him will now understand.’ 15: See Isaiah 52:15. Paul hopes to visit Rome This is written in the Bible about God's Messiah: ‘Those people that nobody ever told them about him will now see. Those people who have never heard about him will now understand.’ 15: See Isaiah 52:15. Paul hopes to visit Rome This is written in the Bible about God's Messiah:
korean_text: 기록된 바 주의 소식을 받지 못한 자들이 볼 것이요 듣지 못한 자들이 깨달으리라 함과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: This is written in the Bible
Those people that nobody ever told them about him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에 대해 아무도 알려주지 않았던 사람들

sentences.original_text: Those people who have never heard about him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에 대해 한번도 들어보지 못했던 사람들
